kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Get Current Date
kw.doc: Returns current local or UTC time with an optional increment.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.arg: xpath=//button[contains(@class, 'role-button') and .//span[text()='ผู้ค้าตราสารหนี้']]
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element 'xpath=//button[contains(@class, 'role-button') and .//span[text()='ผู้ค้าตราสารหนี้']]'.
kw.arg: xpath=//button[contains(@class, 'role-button') and .//span[text()='ผู้ค้าตราสารหนี้']]

kw.name: Get Current Date
kw.doc: Returns current local or UTC time with an optional increment.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Password
